targets.rawSql:
SELECT account_equity, to_timestamp(archive_timestamp/1e6)
FROM
app_profile_cache 
WHERE 
id IN ($profile_id)
AND archive_timestamp > $__unixEpochFrom()::bigint*1000000

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), sum(amount)
FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE profile_id in ($profile_id) and timestamp > $__unixEpochFrom()::bigint*1000000 and status='success' and ops_type in ('pnl', 'funding', 'fee')
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT
  t1.id AS profile_id, t1.wallet, t1.balance, t1.account_equity, t1.cum_unrealized_pnl AS unrealized_pnl, t1.withdrawable_balance, t1.health, t1.account_leverage, t1.cum_trading_volume,
  t1.total_position_margin, t1.total_notional*0.03 AS maintenance_margin, t1.total_order_margin, 
  TO_TIMESTAMP(t1.last_update/1000000::numeric) AS last_update
FROM app_profile_cache t1
WHERE t1.id IN ($profile_id)
  AND t1.archive_timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '2 minute'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint

SELECT
  t1.market_id, t1.profile_id, t1.size, t1.side, t1.entry_price, t1.unrealized_pnl, t1.notional, t1.margin, t1.notional*0.03 AS maintenance_margin, t1.liquidation_price, t1.fair_price,
  to_timestamp(t1.archive_timestamp/1e6) AS archive_timestamp
FROM
  app_position t1
WHERE
  t1.profile_id in ($profile_id) AND t1.archive_timestamp IN (
    (SELECT
      MAX(archive_timestamp)
    FROM
      app_position
    WHERE
      shard_id='BTC-USD'),
    (SELECT
      MAX(archive_timestamp)
    FROM
      app_position
    WHERE
      shard_id='ETH-USD'),
    (SELECT
      MAX(archive_timestamp)
    FROM
      app_position
    WHERE
      shard_id='SOL-USD'),

    WHERE

      FROM

      WHERE
        shard_id = 'SEI-USD'
    )
  )
;

SELECT
 market_id, sum(price*size) as notional
 FROM app_fill
 WHERE profile_id IN ($profile_id) AND liquidation = TRUE
 GROUP BY rollup(market_id)

SELECT market_id, sum(-1*fee)
FROM app_fill
WHERE profile_id IN ($profile_id)
GROUP BY rollup(market_id)

SELECT time_bucket('1d'::interval, to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6)) as time, SUM(fee) as fee
FROM app_fill
WHERE profile_id = $profile_id and timestamp > $__from::bigint*1000
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), market_id, price, size, price*size notional, side, is_maker, fee, liquidation, order_id, trade_id
 FROM app_fill WHERE profile_id = $profile_id 
 order by timestamp DESC

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), market_id, price, size, price*size notional, side, is_maker, fee, liquidation, order_id, trade_id
 FROM app_fill WHERE profile_id IN ($profile_id) AND liquidation = TRUE
 order by timestamp DESC

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), market_id, profile_id, order_type, status, price, initial_size,side,total_filled_size,size, reason
 FROM app_order WHERE profile_id in ($profile_id)
 ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), profile_id, wallet, ops_type,  amount,status, ops_id2, reason, txhash
 FROM app_balance_operation 
 WHERE profile_id = $profile_id AND timestamp BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom()::bigint*1000000 AND $__unixEpochTo()::bigint*1000000 AND ops_type IN ('deposit', 'withdrawal')
 order by timestamp DESC
 LIMIT 100

SELECT shard_id,ops_type, SUM(amount) 
FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE profile_id in ($profile_id) 

GROUP BY ROLLUP(ops_type),rollup(shard_id) ORDER BY shard_id, ops_type
LIMIT 100

SELECT time_bucket('1d'::interval, to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6)) as time, sum(amount), shard_id
 FROM app_balance_operation 
 WHERE profile_id = $profile_id AND timestamp BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom()::bigint*1000000 AND $__unixEpochTo()::bigint*1000000 AND ops_type NOT IN ('funding', 'fee', 'deposit', 'withdrawal')
 GROUP BY time, ROLLUP(shard_id)
 order by time DESC

SELECT
    to_timestamp(t1.archive_timestamp/1e6) AS archive_timestamp, t1.id AS profile_id, t1.balance, t1.account_equity, t1.cum_unrealized_pnl AS unrealized_pnl, t1.account_margin
FROM
  app_profile_cache t1
  WHERE t1.id=$profile_id 
  and t1.archive_timestamp between $__unixEpochFrom()::bigint*1000000 and $__unixEpochTo()::bigint*1000000
LIMIT 100

SELECT time_bucket('1 day'::interval, to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6)) AS day_bucket, sum(amount) AS Amount, shard_id 
FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE profile_id in ($profile_id) 
and ops_type in ('fee') 
and timestamp > $__from::bigint*1000
GROUP BY day_bucket, shard_id
ORDER BY day_bucket DESC
